title: Full Stack Software Engineer
description: Join Shopify's engineering team to build scalable e-commerce solutions. Work with React, Node.js, and Ruby on Rails to create merchant-facing tools.

title: Backend Software Developer
description: Build robust financial infrastructure using Python, Django, and AWS. Focus on scalable APIs and data processing systems.

title: Software Engineer - AI/ML
description: Work on cutting-edge AI models and infrastructure. Experience with Python, TensorFlow/PyTorch, and distributed systems required.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Manage cloud infrastructure on AWS, implement CI/CD pipelines, and ensure system reliability. Experience with Kubernetes and Docker preferred.

title: Data Engineer
description: Build data pipelines and analytics infrastructure. Work with Python, SQL, Apache Spark, and cloud platforms to process large datasets.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Create responsive web applications using React, TypeScript, and modern CSS. Work on payment processing interfaces and merchant dashboards.

title: Software Developer - Fintech
description: Develop secure payment solutions using Java, Spring Boot, and microservices architecture. Focus on banking integrations and compliance.

title: Cloud Solutions Engineer
description: Design and implement cloud-native solutions on AWS. Work with legal tech stack including Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, and Redis.

title: Software Engineer - Platform
description: Build platform infrastructure and developer tools. Experience with Python, Go, Kubernetes, and distributed systems architecture.

title: Junior Software Developer
description: Entry-level position working on small business financial software. Learn and grow with React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL in an agile environment.
